name: language-lua-plus
description: Lua grammar and snippets for Atom.
author: Ademir Ferreira <ademir.ferreiracif@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Azganoth)

suggestion_description.title: Show description and help URL
suggestion_description.description: Shows below of the suggestion a description and an URL to a help page.

keyword.title: Keywords
keyword.description: Enables keywords to be shown as suggestions. Examples: test.

control.title: Control Structures
control.description: Enables control structures to be shown as suggestions. Examples: test.

function.title: Function Statements
function.description: Enables function statements to be shown as suggestions. Examples: test.

basic.title: Basic Functions
basic.description: Enables basic functions to be shown as suggestions, e.g, assert, print, tostring.

coroutine.title: Coroutines
coroutine.description: Enables coroutines to be shown as suggestions.

package.title: Modules
package.description: Enables modules functions to be shown as suggestions.

string.title: String Manipulation
string.description: Enables string manipulation functions to be shown as suggestions.

utf8.title: UTF-8 Support
utf8.description: Enables utf-8 support functions to be shown as suggestions.

table.title: Table Manipulation
table.description: Enables table manipulation functions to be shown as suggestions.

math.title: Mathematical Functions
math.description: Enables mathematical manipulation functions to be shown as suggestions.

io.title: Input and Output Facilities
io.description: Enables input and output facilities to be shown as suggestions.

os.title: Operating System Facilities
os.description: Enables operating system facilities to be shown as suggestions.

debug.title: Debug Interface
debug.description: Enables debug interface functions to be shown as suggestions.
